msbt.message: Ah, you found it. I was actually hoping you would all along.Alright, hand it over so I can open it up for you!
Hey, you found it!<10_4 /> Alright, let's take a look and see what's inside
How about that—you found it! We're totally on the same brain wavelength, don't you think? Alright, let's open this bad boy up and see what's inside!
What could it be, what could it beee?
There's nothing to be afraid of. But, just in casedid you happen to bring any protective eyewear?
Spoiler alert—the package is filled with my zest for life!<10_4 /> Kidding, kidding.
Well, look at that. It's your very own !Bet you're glad you played this little game now, huh?
As I like to say on occasion ! Hope you like your new ! No, really—it's yours. Take it! Enjoy! Think nothing of it.
Ta-daaa! Just for you, it's !
Oh, going to play it that way, are you?
Oh, that's a classic move. Well played, truly.
Had a change of heart, have we?Normally, I would gloatbut this time I'll play it cool and just take that off your hands, .
Hey, that was fun, wasn't it?You got to do all the searching, and I just sat here and rubbed my hands together like an evil mastermind.
Aww, that was fun. I'll never forget the look on your face
Hey, you got a great prize and we got to spend some quality time together. And by together, I mean completely apart.

So you couldn't find it I'm disappointed, but mostly with myself for making it too hard. I mean, I like to win, but I also like to celebrate other folks' wins. It's a little thing I like to callwin-win.
Well, I suppose it was my turn to have the winged goddess of victory smile upon me. And you had theflat-footed demon of defeat frown right at your face. But it's all in good fun!
Well, on the one hand, you lost. But look on the bright side—you lost to the great ! No shame in that at all.
Well, that's one way for me to win. By default!Yeah, it's not as exciting as a regular win. Let's play again soon so I can win for real!
Ah, you finally came back. I thought maybe you moved to another island!Anyway, now that I know that you're alright, let's call it a day. Good game, I suppose
Wow, you must have scoured the whole island to have been gone that long! I'd tell you where I hid it, but I already forgot. I guess we'll both be hunting next time!
Better late than neverbut not by much this time.I'll be holding onto that for now, thank you very much.
Don't worry. I'm sure you'll have another chance soon enough.And don't they say that failure is the key to success?<10_4 /> That means you'll nail it next time, !
